CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper January 24, 1953, pg. 30, reads: "Celebration of YMCA Week Starts This Saturday - Drama Training - Life is drama and the world's a stage. Almost everybody likes to act. Under the tutorship of Fred Malone, 'Y' groups go in for a lot of showing how other folks live and act. Training in drama develops acting skill and leadership ability. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Two men and three women, actors, including one wielding bent clothes hanger, enacting dramatic scene in Centre Avenue YMCA
